name: shop
description:
The shop command extracts retail shops from OSM data. Categories include:

- Food: supermarkets, bakeries, butchers, etc.
- Clothing: clothes, shoes, jewelry
- Electronics: computers, phones, appliances
- Health: pharmacies, opticians
- Home: furniture, kitchen, decor
- DIY: hardware, garden centres
- Sports: outdoor, bicycles, fishing
- Beauty: cosmetics, hairdressers
- Car: car parts, repair, tyres

options.-t, --type: Filter by shop type (e.g., supermarket, bakery)
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: food, clothing, electronics, health, home, diy, sports, beauty, car, other
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Shop features with:
- shop: Shop type
- name: Shop name
- brand: Brand name
- opening_hours: Business hours
- Coordinates
